content.question: Use the template provided to construct a cladogram based on the EPAS1 gene SNP sequences reported for each population. Circle the location on the cladogram that represents the most recent common ancestor of the populations shown in the table.

frqParts.text: Use the template provided to construct a cladogram based on the EPAS1 gene SNP sequences reported for each population. Circle the location on the cladogram that represents the most recent common ancestor of the populations shown in the table.

skill.text: 2.D: Represent relationships within biological models, including mathematical models, diagrams, flowcharts, and systems.
